channel.title: Weekly Digests on Thomas Lam
channel.description: Recent content in Weekly Digests on Thomas Lam

item.title: Weekly Digest 1
item.description: Week 04/15 - 04/21 This is the first post of my weekly blog series on interesting things I’ve read/listened. I also try to keep myself accountable in terms of self education by including the What I am working on section at the end. News Notre Dame fire Sri Lanka Easter bombings Mueller report TLDR: found no conclusive evidence of Trump admin’s collusion with Russia; showed instances of Trump clearly frustrated about the investigation and tried to manipulate the justice system in many ways Verge’s coverage of Andrew Yang
